DOC.brief_summary: Recent improvement cell culture system lead shift vitro fertilization ( IVF ) practice early cleavage stage embryo transfer ( ET ) blastocyst transfer . Blastocyst culture transfer could theoretically provide good synchronization embryo uterine endometrium . The purpose study compare pregnancy rate implantation rate follow transfer thaw cleavage embryo blastocyst culture thawed cleavage embryo .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Outcomes Following Transfer Blastocysts Cultured From Thawed Cleavage Stage Embryos
DOC.detailed_description: The proposal study approve institutional review board institution 's ethical committee , participant sign write consent enter study . All patient randomly divide two group thaw cleavage embryo transfer transfer blastocyst thaw cleavage embryo . Embryos transfer hormone replacement cycle . Preparation endometrium start second day menstruation continue accord transfer type ( blastocyst cleavage ) . βhCG assess 14 day embryo transfer . Treatment cycle outcome compare 2 group .
DOC.criteria: The patient first type infertility Age ≤ 37 year Long ovulation induction protocol Any previous surgery uterus ovary Uterine factor infertility Sever Male factor infertility ( TESE , TESA ،Oligoteratozoospermia ) Recurrent abortion The woman poor ovarian reserve
